com.brightcove.player.captioning

Class BrightcoveClosedCaptioningOptionsDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Fragment
      • android.app.DialogFragment
        • com.brightcove.player.captioning.BrightcoveClosedCaptioningOptionsDialog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.content.DialogInterface.OnCancelListener, android.content.DialogInterface.OnDismissListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    @Emits(events="captionsStyleOptions")
public class BrightcoveClosedCaptioningOptionsDialog
extends android.app.DialogFragment
    A DialogFragment for presenting styling options for closed captioning, and allowing them to be saved and loaded from the application.
